answers.answer: Drink a coke and lay down. Try to relax and nap if possible. :)
Drink a coke and nap. That's about all you can do. If they're terrible you can call your ob. If you're past 20w and having migraines it could be a sign of preeclampsia. You could also be dehydrated.
was about to post something about this..I'm feeling the same way on top of I suffer from migraines I just take a nap and it help sometimes I hope I can get something stronger prescribed
Ask your Dr. If he or she can prescribe you any meds for headaches.

question: So i have been having the worst headaches and tylenol does not begin to phase them, what else can i do or take that wont hurt the baby but will give me some relief??!! Please help!!
title: headaches!!
